# airdrop_namespaceconfigs (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "airdrop_namespaceconfigs" "current" {
  namespace = "default"

  filter {
    operator = "equals"
    field    = "spec.patchwork_config.project_name"
    value    = "devops-dev"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

- `value` (String) Value to use for the query term.
